description:
Orifushi Mafuyu is the youngest of the Orifushi sisters, being two years younger than http://anidb.net/ch21010 [Haruomi] and http://anidb.net/ch19271 [Akina]. She is quiet and stoic, and her emotions are subdued and rarely have obvious changes. Mafuyu likes to read, and her strong sexual curiosity prompts her to regularly read erotic novels. Haruomi has unintentionally seen her masturbating quite a few times. She is intelligent and mischievous, and she hates to lose.
Source: VNDB
name: Orifushi Mafuyu
